summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JarlPM MVP - backend APIs working well (93.3% success), frontend loads correctly with minor authentication flow inconsistencies during automated testing

minor_bugs.issue: Create epic returns 200 instead of 201 status code
minor_bugs.impact: Functional but incorrect HTTP status code

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent redirects to landing page during automated testing

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections (hero, features, pricing, lifecycle)
Epic CRUD operations (list, get, create, delete)
Epic workflow endpoints (chat, transcript, decisions, artifacts)
API authentication with session token works
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor backend status code issue (epic creation should return 201). Investigate frontend authentication flow inconsistency - ProtectedRoute component sometimes redirects to landing page during automated testing, though manual testing works correctly.
